summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4279 for the improvement of 40th Avenue North, from East Madison Street to McGilvra Boulevard; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 50874, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
